mapper.select: select COUNT(1) as num,COUNT(distinct bill_amount) as amount_num, SUM(bill_amount) as amountTotal, MIN(bill_amount) as amountMin, MAX(bill_amount) as amountMax, AVG(bill_amount) as amountAvg from bill
select COUNT(1),sum(bill_amount) from bill group by is_delete having sum(bill_amount)>200

select
from bill where id>10 union all select
from bill where id < 5
select * from bill_item as bi join bill as b on b.id=bi.bill_id where b.is_delete=0
select id, bill_name as text, bill_amount as billAmount, create_time as createTime, is_delete as isDelete from bill where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
